page.topic: Placing Hyperlinks, Mail-to Links, and FTP Links on a Form
page.description: There are two easy ways to put hyperlinks, mail-to links, and FTP links on a form.

section.title: Hyperlinks and Mail-to Links
section.description: Any type-in box that contains character data, either bound to a field in a table or generated by a calculated value, can be formatted as URL or Email.

step.description: Select Properties... to display the Setup tab.
Select "URL" or "Email" in the Field Type list.
